    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(byte[] ip,
        byte[] mac)
        Initialises ARPTable entries. This method should be called before any of Layer2 methods are used.
        Parameters:
        ip - - IP address
        mac - - corresponding MAC address

      • recieveFromLayer3

        public static void recieveFromLayer3(Layer3Frame frame,
                     byte[] nextHopAddress,
                     Host host)
        Receives IP packets from layer 3, performs required layer 2 processing and hands a Layer 2 frame to Layer 1.
        Parameters:
        frame - The layer 3 IP packet to be sent
        nextHopAddress - - IP address of the next hop node in the path
        host - - current host machine information processing this packet

      • recieveFromLayer1

        public static void recieveFromLayer1(Layer2Frame frame,
                     Host host)
        Receives a Layer2 frame from layer 1, performs the required processing and passes a Leyer3 frame to Layer3
        Parameters:
        frame - - layer 2 frame
        host - - current host machine information processing this packet
